installation\/index.md.En fonction de leur nombre et de leur co: Depending on their number and their cumulative consumption, on a Raspberry Pi you may need an additional USB hub with its dedicated power supply

installation\/index.md.Les cartes microSD ont une durée de vie: MicroSD cards have a very limited lifespan due to intensive data exchange
installation\/index.md.à ne réserver que pour de courtes périod: only to be reserved for short periods of testing
installation\/index.md.et peuvent avoir besoin d'une connexion: and may need an internet connection
installation\/index.md.Jeedom est un logiciel qui est et rester: Jeedom is software that is and will remain open source, its use is completely free and does not depend on a cloud or a subscription
installation\/index.md.Cependant, certains plugins qui permette: However, some plugins that increase the capacity of Jeedom or its use may be chargeable

installation\/index.md.Une fois l'installation faite, n'oubliez: Once the installation is done, do not forget to consult the documentation
